src_original: yā puna bhikṣuṇī samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasamvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
tgt_original: 「若比丘尼，欲壞和合僧，勤方便受破僧法，堅持不捨。

src_original: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
tgt_original: 是比丘尼應諫彼比丘尼言：

src_original: mā ārye samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya /  bhedanasamvartanīyam vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
tgt_original: 『大姊！ 汝莫壞和合僧，莫方便壞和合僧，莫受破僧法，堅持不捨。

src_original: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodayamāna avivadamāno /  na pratiniḥsareya /
tgt_original: 與僧和合，歡喜不諍，同一師學，如水乳合，於佛法中有增益安樂住。

src_original: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /  yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya /
tgt_original: 』是比丘尼諫彼比丘尼時，堅持不捨。 是比丘尼應三諫，捨此事故。

src_original: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā /  vargavādinīyo anuvartikāḥ samanujñāḥ saṃghabhedāya /
tgt_original: 「若比丘尼，有餘比丘尼群黨，若一、若二、若三，乃至無數。

src_original: tā bhikṣuṇyaḥ bhikṣuṇyo evam āhuḥ /  mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha /
tgt_original: 彼比丘尼語是比丘尼言：
